statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT M1.BUMON_CD ,M1.BUMON_NM ,M1.BUMONKANA_NM ,M1.SYOHINGUN1_CD ,M1.SIIREZEI_KB ,M1.URIAGEZEI_KB ,M1.ADD_YMD ,M1.ADD_TM ,M1.ADDTAN_CD ,M1.UPD_YMD ,M1.UPD_TM ,M1.UPD_TANCD ,M1.SAKUJYO_YMD ,M1.SAKUJYO_FLG ,M1.JYUSIN_YMD ,M1.JYUSIN_TM FROM BOMT0060 M1 WHERE M1.BUMON_CD =
